website_summaries.verdict: Scientifically designed to increase volume for both men and women with each shampoo.
pros: Helps thicken even the weakest hair
Contains biotin, keratin, and other all-natural ingredients
Reviewers suggest hair looks and feels more voluminous after only a few weeks of use
cons: Reviews suggest the shampoo helps with hair growth and volume, but doesn't prevent future hair loss

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy to say that the bare spots are no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally review products but I think this item warrants a positive review. I have been using it for about a week and from day one could tell a huge difference in the feel of the hair. I had lost a lot of hair this past year due to illness and had a hard time covering the bare spots created from the hair loss. I am so happy to say that the bare spots are no longer an issue. I love this product and will continue buying it. Thanks from a truly greatful customer.
customer_reviews.author: gamelover

customer_reviews.title: I Like it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but this was the worst shipping experience I have ever had with Amazon! took all most two weeks to get this and the looked a little rough. I have used this twice and my hair feels thicker - just make sure you rinse it very well
customer_reviews.author: Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted to like it :(
customer_reviews.text: This thin shampoo smells strongly of Bazooka bubble gum and makes your hair feel like straw. When you try get your fingers through it while washing (I have hair past my shoulders) and when you try to comb/brush it through after shampooing, it rips out. I hate to use conditioner because it makes my fine hair limp, so I now condition before washing and use a volumizing shampoo after washing to get rid of the smell. Definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bo

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Saw absolutely no results as advertised and dried my hair out a lot. I gave it a 6 weeks try out including another shampoo from this maker, but neither did anything for me. Money back guarantee was over in 30 days, but that was not enough to see or not see a difference. It takes longer when trying out new products. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo! Gives my hair a ton of volume ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo! Gives my hair a ton of volume and really helps with hair loss. Amazing smell and amazing quality. I will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: this shampoo gives amazing volume and thickness
customer_reviews.text: this shampoo gives amazing volume and thickness. The healthy ingredients and lack of chemicals really reduces hair loss and my color treated hair was not affected at all. I love the smell! Definitely worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - I can see the results after only using a few times. I highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jared M.

customer_reviews.title: I am dealing with telogen effluvium and pretty much gave up on my hair ever growing back
customer_reviews.text: I am dealing with telogen effluvium and pretty much gave up on my hair ever growing back. We got to keep in mind it’s not an overnight process, but after 3-4 month using the shampoo I started seeing baby hairs coming in and my scalp was less visible! It’s very gentle and smells like a green/tropical smoothie! It’s not an overnight process but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Horacio Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo. It does not dry out your hair and seems to be working. My husband just went through 6 rounds of chemo and he is using it to jump start hair growth. I just want to keep my hair as it is long and this stuff leaves my hair in beautiful condition and I have noticed less hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: maryellen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shampoo although rather expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this shampoo! It leaves my hair shiny, with more volume, and healthy looking. I have been using it for several months and I believe that my hair loss has diminished, although not as much as I would hope. I'm planning to continue it's use, although it is definitely pricey, and hope I will see less hair loss and new growth. My hair definitely looks better!
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE

customer_reviews.title: Hair appears fuller after one use. Hopefully it will grow fuller too with use!
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this is helping my hair get thicker with more growth. In the meantime, it appears much thicker after one wash. I used a curling iron and got a very full look that held all day and even looked fuller the next day. I can skip curling and get a kind of wild full look that's not bad for a weekend look after using this product. I haven't tried a more straight blow out using this, but I bet my hair will look fuller. Also I don't need to use as much for my long hair as I do with other shampoos which is nice so this will last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: N. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: This product line turned my hair into what it was when I was much younger. Before using the shampoo and conditioner my hair was so brittle and just stiff. After about a week or so, I noticed that my hair was incredibly soft and thicker but yet very manageable and my shedding has gone down tremendously. I haven’t been able to tell if any new growth has come in because of my long hair but I do see a difference in my hair quality. Will be purchasing from this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: JHONNY R.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo! Strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for three weeks, and this shampoo has been very fine with me. It adds 5-15% more volume to my hair, making it appear richer and better. Furthermore, it has sweet fragrance! Some reviewers commented that this shampoo dries out their hair. It does dry my hair, but a tiny little bit. It's not an issue! I think this shampoo might regrow my hair, but after more use, I will update my review. As this shampoo is very good, I decided to order re:line conditioner and got it recently! Strongly recommend this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: Hart Song

customer_reviews.title: Best Shampoo I have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a shampoo that actually does what it says it will do; adds volume and helps with hair loss. I was amazed at how full and healthy my hair looks. It is expensive but if you have thinning hair or treat your hair this is one way to keep its silky feeling and from falling out due to processing. Compared to most brands I have used over the years this is above and beyond the very best, especially for someone as they age.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted in my case
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work for me. I haven’t seen any improvement in my hair volume or new hair growing. As some customers are mentioned this is not what you would hope for. I felt like my hair was actually thinning so I stopped using it. Money wasted in my case. I’m getting better hair results with Garnier Whole Blends. And it’s five times cheaper, by company that has a name for a good quality products.
customer_reviews.author: dukeofkrajina

customer_reviews.title: It works like a miracle
customer_reviews.text: I have a very thin hair and I have used many different products. This is by far the only best product on the market, I noticed positive results after the first use, I have used it three times so far and my hair feels stronger and fuller and what I love the most after using this shampoo is that I see no hair falling when I say no hair I mean not even one strand.. I recommend this to anyone with thin hair or anyone who is experiencing hair loss, it is pricey for daily shampoo but cheap for the results it gives I will buy it again and again
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Haven't noticed any difference
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shampoo pretty regularly for the last few months and have not noticed any difference in my hair's volume, or in a decreased amount or rate of hair loss. Probably not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has made my hair thicker and added more volume to my thinning hair !
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: This has helped get some of that frizzy out of it and while I am in disparate need of a haircut ( leave for Vaca in two weeks and have an apt right before I Leave ) I am sure that the continued use of it and after the cut I will be even happier with the health of my hair
customer_reviews.text: only have used this for a little over a week ~ but can tell an difference in the texture of my hair. I professional color my hair and sometimes it does get very dry. This has helped get some of that frizzy out of it and while I am in disparate need of a haircut ( leave for Vaca in two weeks and have an apt right before I Leave ) I am sure that the continued use of it and after the cut I will be even happier with the health of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 💔
customer_reviews.text: So Sad ....wanted to love it....most people it has worked really well for me it was a disaster....I have permed bleached blonde hair and it made it like straw each time I used it and the conditioner....has to throw both away....💔
customer_reviews.author: anne Kathryn cliborne

customer_reviews.title: This lightened my newly frosted hair!
customer_reviews.text: This lightened my newly frosted hair considerably and was very drying. I was not happy with this product. When I received it, the seal was broken and it was in a very sticky plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: No shampoo is worth this price, unless it requires a prescription.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this re:line biotin shampoo a few months ago and after using the whole bottle I can say that it definitely made my hair fuller and softer. I would even give it a 5-star review, except for the price. When I bought this product it was selling for two thirds the price it is now. The current price of 27.99 is ridiculous for an 8 oz. bottle of shampoo, and I refuse to pay it. I thought the previous, lower price was too high but I was willing to try it at that price. They have priced this product out of the market so far as I am concerned, and I have to reduce my rating to two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Christian I.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair product.
customer_reviews.text: This hair product is really excellent... I found out that I have thyroid and i loses almost all my hair...and my hair was dropping out constantly and it was very trashy... Now i have back my hair ...i will definitely buying again...love it...it doesn't smell so good but i still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Evangelist Foster

customer_reviews.title: Hair
customer_reviews.text: The only shampoo I will ever use. It has made a bid difference in my hair loss. Been buying it regularly. Tried other Biotin shampoos, but did not work like this one. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Idalia M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the feeling of it
customer_reviews.text: Thickens the hair. Love the feeling of it. Nice smell
customer_reviews.author: 3xter

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love paisle products. Have been using the shampoos for about 5 months and the improvement in my hair density is very noticeable. Love the new conditioner also!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: shampoo smell.does make hair thicker .
customer_reviews.text: shampoo smells great to soon to tell if it regrows hair .will give another review after I use alittle while longer. the seller is awesome great communication. upodate so far so good like this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hall

customer_reviews.title: It's work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the Biotin Hair Loss Shampoo about a week ago and at first I was skeptical about the result.., now a week later, I am happy with the results and pretty sure that this product will continue working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Avi  Dori

customer_reviews.title: A great product always packed well and shipped promptlyl
customer_reviews.text: I like this shampoo so much that I subscribe. It makes a rich lather and hair gets really clean, which is so important to styling very fine, baby soft hair that requires daily shampooing.
customer_reviews.author: ssddspas

customer_reviews.title: ... and thicker but it cleans and foams up really nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it is actually making my thin hair stronger and thicker but it cleans and foams up really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LilysMama

customer_reviews.title: Get fuller looking hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this product for a couple of weeks and am happy with my purchase. My hair if very fine and straight. This shampoo makes my hair look fuller and thicker. I get a lot of compliments. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been about a week and I’ve already noticed a difference in the look and feel of my hair. The static is noticeably diminished and my hair is smooth without being flat and lifeless. Additionally my hair feels fuller and thicker- a miracle since I have BABY FINE hair that is also thin! The smell is clean, not overly flowery which I like, overall I am very impressed and pleased and hopeful!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. French

customer_reviews.title: It did not work on me!
customer_reviews.text: This item was overpriced and honestly it made no difference to my hair shedding . I used up the entire bottle with hopes for a difference and no. I would not purchase again .
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Did not have a noticeable affect
customer_reviews.text: Used everyday until the bottle was gone and did not see any changes. Not a terrible shampoo but definitely did not make any improvements to hair.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo3000

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo feels luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo to help volumize my thinning hair. It feels luxurious when using only just a small amount and my hair is so nice after drying. I’ve only used for a week so I’m hoping for long term results. Great vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Pigoni

customer_reviews.title: ... using this shampoo for several months and I am pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for several months and I am pleased with the results. In the last few years I noticed when I would brush my hair I would found more hair on the brush then usual and since using this product I am losing less hair then before.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M McBeth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo. I color my hair but I still want it to be a bit thicker and this shampoo does the job without stripping my color. Highly recommend for anyone who wants thicker hair.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Setters

customer_reviews.title: I just got the shampoo and used it for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got the shampoo and used it for the first time this week. It gave my hair so much volume and shine. I’ll continue to use it and give another update in another month.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi "Max"

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: its great. After every use i see the difference. I usually use it with volumizing conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Avijit Sarkar

customer_reviews.title: This product too IS AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - noticed difference after first use - hair feels and looks fuller and thicker - anxious to continue use

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really enjoy this shampoo. I've been using it for about a month now. It has a pleasant scent and I've noticed a difference in the thickness of my overall hair. It looks like I also have some new growth in my hair line. I'll update again if I notice any side-effects or if my opinion changes.
customer_reviews.author: J Robinson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this shampoo a few times now so I can't say too much yet, but after the 3rd washing, my hair felt very soft, and my natural waves are more pronounced because my hair is lighter and not weighed down as much as with cheaper shampoos do. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M.

customer_reviews.title: Takes time!
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a chance.... So far, so good! This is giving me good volume at this point. Want to get through the first bottle for a real review. Stay tuned!
customer_reviews.author: Tillynscoop

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. Now my slide on shoes smell much better.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Odle

customer_reviews.title: I liked it!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a real increase in volume! I tried the "tip" on the side of the bottle....using the conditioner first, then the shampoo....I liked it!! Conditioners always weighed my hair down, I like this way of using it! I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Catlady

customer_reviews.title: I had hair straight so I have to get a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had hair straight so I have to get a special shampoo. .. it's the second time for purchase shampoo from this brand , it's worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Davidzon

customer_reviews.title: This stuff actually works
customer_reviews.text: In High School, I was voted most likely to recede and I am well along in the process. This product does make a positive difference and perhaps bought me a few more hairy years --- Highly recommend it -- Bruce

customer_reviews.title: I have really fine thin hair and it seems to really be working
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this shampoo a couple of times since I received it, but I can tell a difference. I have really fine thin hair and it seems to really be working. I will Continue my review as I use it longer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks it is working after couple weeks... I hve to see the long term.

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair. This shampoo has given my hair fullness as well as softness and strength from the Biotin. I have also purchased the thickening shampoo as well, so I do alternate between the two. I love them both very much!

customer_reviews.title: Noticed a difference in 8 days. Not a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in 8 days. Not a huge difference But enough volume that it doesn't lay flat. Looking forward to a whole month

customer_reviews.title: This kind of shampoo is very new for me. ...
customer_reviews.text: This kind of shampoo is very new for me. Am a little stressed because of my new hair loss era that started last month. As of now the shampoo reduced my hair loss. The smell is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't noticed any differences yet, after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any differences yet, after a few weeks of use. I did some similar products in the drug store and may give those a try next time.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen L.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Smells nice and left hair feeling good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Smells nice and left hair feeling good. Will know more in a few weeks if it thickens (I have fine hair so I don’t wash it every day) but I liked my initial impression.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Garden

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: My hair is getting finer and a little thinner with age. Quite an unwelcome surprise. I was hoping for more volume and body with your product. I only used the shampoo about 3 times. It made my very soft and very limp with no body. Not the product for me. I have short hair. Perhaps that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I had two pretty big bald spots and one is completely re-growing
customer_reviews.text: There is hair regrowth since using this. I had two pretty big bald spots and one is completely re-growing. Other spot is not. Smell is okay but the consistency is weird. I feel Like I had to use a lot to even get a lather to cover my whole head. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ncarr300

customer_reviews.title: WONDER SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.text: I Wanted to recommend this WONDER SHAMPOO!! I used it only several times and the results are just amazing! My hair is stronger, Fuller, thicker and super healthy!! After countless attempts to rehabilitate my damaged hair, I decided to give a shot to this shampoo and I'm really pleased! Such a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Debbieda

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. I have been using it for two weeks now, and honestly did not noticed any reduction in hair loss. However, the shampoo gives nice volume to my hair as promised. I hope it will work with continuation of use.
customer_reviews.author: oksana svirkova

customer_reviews.title: Drying shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Used shampoo one time and it is very drying. Left my hair completely stripped of moisture and flat. Will be giving to husband. I can't recommend this product, not for me anyway.

customer_reviews.title: Good volume
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help with volume, I like the smell, only used it a week so far so we'll see over time h ow it works but I like it so far!

customer_reviews.text: This shampoo did absolutely nothing for my hair. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: live love and have great hair

customer_reviews.text: My hair appears thicker when I use this shampoo. I have noticed that I don't have so many hair going down the drain so hopefully my hair will be healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far its good but still too early to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Been using the shapoo for about a week and I already notice increased volum and thickness. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Have been experiencing hair loss last couple of months. I decided to give it a shot. The shampoo has a nice smell, and only a small amount is needed. Hopefully it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great volume shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Adds a great bit of volume. Super happy with it but pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: When my hair began to thin, I tried several shampoos to fight it. I love this one. No obnoxious smell! It cleans well, and rinses clean easily. I became a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: THIS IS A FRAUDULENT REVIEW!!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shampoo but doesn’t thicken or regrow hair. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mario de los Santos

customer_reviews.title: improves the texture of my hair
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair which is beginning to look thinner as I age (73). I've used Biotin 3 times and it seems to give my hair more texture and body and holds my style longer.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Reeves

customer_reviews.title: AVOID WASTING YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed! I used this product everyday for 2 months and actually felt my hair getting thinner after each use. Would not recommend and not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product has done wonders for my thinning hair. It feels natural and looks much better. My hairdresser has noted a great improvement in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin R. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I noticed after the first wash, that my hair was a bit more fuller and thicker. Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Leadership

product_meta.title: Biotin Hair Loss Shampoo - Volume Shampoo For Hair Growth ALL NATURAL Thickening For Thinning Hair Volumizing Treatment For Men & For Women + Caffeine For Fine Hair Sulfate Free For Color Treated Hair
product_meta.description:
Biotin Shampoo For Hair Loss Therapy - Volume Shampoo 



 Using CP:BLOCK technology, this natural hair loss shampoo formula was scientifically formulated to reduce hair loss and promote hair growth.



 

 Re:build contains a balanced blend of active botanicals, As Provitamin B7 Biotin infuses nutrients into every strand, Saw Palmetto blocks Dht build up , allowing the Caffeine to stimulate the scalp while Argan Oil and Keratin lock in moisture. 

 

 This powerful formula helps thicken even the weakest strands into fuller , thicker and more abundant looking locks.

 

 Research shows, that male and female hair loss, shedding, and breakage are very often caused by the lack of proper hair nourishment, access of DHT or weakness of the hair strand, years were spent researching and developing the perfect blend of botanicals to naturally treat and rejuvenate your hair, your search for natural hair loss products ends here.

 

Deeper cleansing to remove volume-inhibiting impurities without sulfates Contain no harsh chemicals such as formaldehyde - lye - parabens - sulfates - phosphates phthalates - SLS - or sodium chloride. All Natural Ingredients Including - Biotin - Argan Oil - Keratin - Caffeine - Hemp seed oil - Glycerine and Rice Protein. Use to Stop hair loss caused by improper hair nourishment Natural DHT Treatment Amazing botanical scent 100% Cruelty free 100% Money back RE:FUNDguarantee!

ANTI HAIR LOSS SHAMPOO for women and men naturally prevents hair loss by blocking DHT the primary cause for thin weak hair by removing DHT this premium Biotin DHT blocker shampoo will give you frizz free shiny thicker and denser hair + Volumizing color treated hair shampoo is Paraben free Sulphate free SLS Salt and Sodium Chloride free
